overview:
Manish is a Co-Founder & COO of Social Lair, a provider of collective business intelligence solutions. Manish has extensive experience in enterprise software with expertise across middleware platforms and industry business solutions. Prior to co-founding Social Lair, Manish held key management positions at Sun Microsystems across sales, marketing, alliances and R&D. His career has spanned US, Asia-Pacific and Emerging Markets, where as the Head of its India Software Business, his leadership was integral to a multi-fold growth in Sun’s software sales in India and other countries across the region.

Manish holds an M.S. and Ph.D. from Stanford University and a B.Tech. from Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi.

image.attribution: Manish Malhotra / Social Lair
